product.title: Robin Hood Sends a Message | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Robin Hood Sends a Message

Everyone’s favorite good-guy bandit, Robin Hood, returns with all of his Sherwood Forest friends in this action-packed spinoff. When Robin Hood sends a secret letter to his star-crossed love, Maid Marian, it’s intercepted by evil Prince John’s minions, revealing Robin Hood’s plans to meet Maid Marian at the fair. Luckily, Lady Kluck overhears Prince John’s wicked plans, and she passes along a warning message to Robin Hood. At the fair, the tables are turned when Robin Hood and his loyal friends capture Prince John and seize the money he’d stolen from the poor.

Tie-in Activity: Inspired by Robin Hood’s desire to help the poor, ask your child to gather some old toys and clothes he no longer uses, and make a trip together to a local donation center. Or, the next time you and your child are at the grocery store together, pick up some extra canned goods to donate to your local food pantry.
